description: Specific parameters required for a job order shall be presented as job order parameters.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: contains
contents.description: The child job order parameter(s) that are part of this job order parameter.

contents.name: correspondsToSpecification
contents.description: This job order parameter(s) corresponds to the parameter specification(s) in the operations definition.

contents.name: correspondsToProcess
contents.description: This job order parameter(s) corresponds to the parameter specification(s) in the process segment.

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy. Optionally, hierarchy scopedefines the scope of the physical asset class, such as the site or area where it is defined

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: value
contents.description: The value, set of values, or range of acceptable values

contents.name: valueUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The engineering units in which the value is defined.
